mapper.update: UPDATE board SET contents = #{contents} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(id, btype, aid, title, contents, nodel) VALUES(#{id}, #{btype}, #{aid}, #{title}, EMPTY_CLOB(), #{nodel})
mapper.select: SELECT board_seq.NEXTVAL AS seq FROM dual

SELECT a.id, a.btype, b.name AS bname, a.aid, c.nickname AS aname, a.title, a.contents, a.cdate, a.udate, a.vcnt, a.gcnt, a.bcnt, a.nodel FROM board a JOIN board_type b ON a.btype = b.id JOIN account c ON a.aid = c.id WHERE a.deleted = 'n' AND a.id = #{id} ORDER BY a.id DESC
